Detailed Description

Exposes methods for querying database module information.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktDbModule::DbFunctions ( [out, retval] INktDbObjectsEnum **  ppDbObjsEnum)

Retrieves a database functions enumerator associated with this module.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbObjsEnumA pointer to receive the enumerator interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbModule::Id ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the id of the database module.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the module ID.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbModule::Name ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the module name.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to string to receive the module name.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if string buffer is insufficient.
E_FAIL on general error.
